# category

**Instance Property**

The category to which the accessory belongs.

## Declaration

```swift
var category: HMAccessoryCategory { get }
```

## Discussion

The accessory’s [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAccessory/category] property contains an instance of the [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAccessoryCategory] class that indicates the kind of accessory, like light bulb, garage door opener, or faucet. Use this information to help users distinguish among different accessories in their environment.

## Categorizing an accessory

- **HMAccessoryCategory**: A category for a HomeKit accessory.
